H

handleAddBoat() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.MemberController
This method is used to add a boat type object to the server database and then the added boat is displayed in the GUI table.
handleAddBoatM() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to add a boat type object to the server database for a specific member and then the added boat is displayed in the GUI table.
handleAddMember() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to add an object of type Member to the server database and then the added member is displayed in the GUI table.
handleAddRace() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to add an object of type Race to the server database and then the added race is displayed in the GUI table.
handleChoiceMember() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to display in a table called "boatTableS" in the GUI, all boats that have a member chosen from the combobox called "choiceMember".
handleChoiceRace() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to display, in a combobox named "choiceRace" in the GUI, all the races present in the system.
handleContactUsLink() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.LoginController
This method is used to handle the contact us button.
handleHomeButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.Controller
This method is used to manage the login button in the Login.fxml file login scene.
handleLoginButton(ActionEvent) - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.LoginController
This method is used to handle the login button.
handlePayCard(ActionEvent) - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.PaymentController
This method is used in the GUI, specifically by the button called "PAY NOW" in the payment.fxml file to get the Cardholder, Card Number, month, year and CVV do some checks and then call the payment method.
handlePayMembership(ActionEvent) - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.MemberController
This method is used by the button of the Member.fxml file called "Pay Fee" to pay the membership fee, the payment is managed by the PaymentController and Payment.fxml file
handlePayStorage(ActionEvent) - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.MemberController
This method is used by the button of the Member.fxml file called "Pay Storage" to pay the storage fee for each boat identified with its id, the payment is managed by the PaymentController and Payment.fxml file
handlePayWTR(ActionEvent) - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.PaymentController
This method is used in the GUI, specifically by the button called "SEND NOW" in the payment.fxml file to get the Bank Transfer Identification Code do some checks and then call the payment method.
handleReturn(ActionEvent) - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.PaymentController
This method is used by the button called "Return" to change scene and return to the member dashboard.
handleRmvBoat() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.MemberController
This method is used to remove a boat type object from the server database and consequently from the respective GUI table.
handleRmvBoatM() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to remove a boat type object from the server database and consequently from the respective GUI table.
handleRmvMember() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to remove a Member type object from the server database and consequently from the respective GUI table.
handleRmvRace() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to remove a Race type object from the server database and consequently from the respective GUI table.
handleSearchMemberFee() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to search in a table called "tableFee" in the GUI, the membership fee payments of a Member by specifying the tax code of the member.
handleSearchParticipation() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to search a table called "tableFee" in the GUI, for boat entry fee payments to participate in a race by specifying the tax ID of the boat owner or the race id or the boat id.
handleSearchStorage() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to search in a table called "tableStorage" in the GUI, the storage fee payments of a boat by specifying the id of the boat or the tax code of the owner.
handleSendNoticeM() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to send a notification of non-payment for a member's membership fee by specifying the tax ID of the member you want to warn.
handleSendNoticeS() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to send a notification of non-payment for the storage fee of a member's boats, specifying the tax code of the member you want to warn.
handleSignIn(ActionEvent) - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.RegisterController
This method is used to sign up a new user, it sends you an alert message if username or password are exists.
handleSubscribe(ActionEvent) - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.MemberController
This method is used to register a specific boat in a specific race, first you need to make the registration payment managed by the Payment.fxml and PaymentController.java file.
handleUpdateFee() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to update the membership fee that each member enrolled in the system must pay.
handleViewAllInscription() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to display all participants of all races in the GUI table.
handleViewAllMemberFee() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to display all membership fee payments made by members in the GUI table.
handleViewAllStorage() - Method in class progettofinale.sailingclub.controller.StaffController
This method is used to display all storage fee payments made by members in the GUI table.
